title: Implement detail panel
description: Create ui/detail.rs to show full bead info. Display: title, ID, status, type, priority, labels, description (with text wrapping), dependencies section, timestamps. Scrollable if content exceeds height.
close_reason: Implemented detail panel with full bead info in ui/detail.rs

title: Implement create bead modal
description: Create ui/modal.rs with popup dialog for creating new beads. Fields: title (required), type, priority, description. Shell out to 'br create' command. 'n' for root bead, 'N' for child of selected.

title: Implement help overlay
description: Add '?' keybinding to show help overlay. List all keybindings organized by category (navigation, actions, search). Press any key to dismiss.

title: Implement basic app shell with Ratatui
description: Create app.rs with App struct holding state. Set up crossterm terminal, event loop, and basic update/view cycle. Handle quit (q/Ctrl-C). Render placeholder text to verify TUI works.
close_reason: Implemented Ratatui app shell with event loop in app.rs

title: Implement status change popup
description: Add 's' keybinding to show status change popup. List available statuses: open, in_progress, blocked, closed. Arrow keys to select, Enter to confirm. Shell out to 'br update' command.

title: Implement search/filter
description: Add / keybinding to enter search mode. Filter beads by title as user types. Show search input in footer or overlay. Esc to clear filter. Highlight matching text in results.

title: Add color themes
description: Create ui/theme.rs with Theme struct. Include a few built-in themes: Tokyo Night (default), Dracula, Nord. Use colored unicode status indicators. Support 't' to cycle themes. Persist theme choice.

title: Set up Rust project structure
description: Initialize Cargo.toml with dependencies (ratatui, crossterm, rusqlite, tokio, serde, clap, anyhow). Create basic directory structure: src/main.rs, src/app.rs, src/ui/, src/data/. Add .gitignore for Rust.
close_reason: Set up Rust project with Cargo.toml, dependencies, and basic module structure

title: Implement two-pane layout
description: Create ui/layout.rs with resizable horizontal split. Left pane for bead list, right pane for detail. Add status bar at top (project name, counts) and footer with keybindings. Support h/l or </> to resize panes.
close_reason: Implemented two-pane layout with resizable split in ui/layout.rs

title: Implement bead list view
description: Create ui/list.rs with scrollable list of beads. Show status icon (colored unicode), priority badge, and title. Support j/k navigation, highlight selected row. Later: tree view with expand/collapse for parent-child.
close_reason: Implemented bead list widget with status icons in ui/list.rs

title: Implement SQLite bead reader
description: Create data/sqlite.rs to read beads from .beads/beads.db. Parse bead fields: id, title, status, priority, type, description, labels, dependencies, created_at, updated_at. Return Vec<Bead> sorted by status then priority.

title: MVP: beads-tui (bu) TUI application
description: Create a Rust/Ratatui TUI for viewing and managing beads. Lazygit-inspired design with two-pane layout, tree view, and modal dialogs. Reads from SQLite, shells out to br for mutations.
